entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
